Within certain sections of the AdminCP there are areas where an entry into the database requires a product ID#. If you disable this feature users will not be able to view the products name and will automatically enter the default product ID#. 

Only enable this feature when creating a plug-in or 3rd party module.";s:4:"link";s:107:"http://localhost/phpfoxV2/index.php/admincp/user/group/add/?group_id=2&setting=1&module=admincp#iSettingId3";s:4:"type";s:18:"user_group_setting";s:8:"category";s:51:"Members &raquo; User Group Settings &raquo; Admincp";}i:377;a:5:{s:9:"module_id";s:7:"admincp";s:5:"title";s:97:"Has general access to the Admin Control Panel.

This will control how many attachments a user can upload and attach on other items.

If you do not want to allow users the ability to upload items set this to 0.

If you do not want to set a limit set this to null.";s:4:"link";s:110:"http://localhost/phpfoxV2/index.php/admincp/user/group/add/?group_id=2&setting=1&module=attachment#iSettingId7";s:4:"type";s:18:"user_group_setting";s:8:"category";s:54:"Members &raquo; User Group Settings &raquo; Attachment";}i:381;a:5:{s:9:"module_id";s:10:"attachment";s:5:"title";s:33:"Can delete their own attachments?";s:4:"link";s:110:"http://localhost/phpfoxV2/index.php/admincp/user/group/add/?group_id=2&setting=1&module=attachment#iSettingId8";s:4:"type";s:18:"user_group_setting";s:8:"category";s:54:"Members &raquo; User Group Settings &raquo; Attachment";}i:382;a:5:{s:9:"module_id";s:10:"attachment";s:5:"title";s:27:"Can delete all attachments?";s:4:"link";s:110:"http://localhost/phpfoxV2/index.php/admincp/user/group/add/?group_id=2&setting=1&module=attachment#iSettingId9";s:4:"type";s:18:"user_group_setting";s:8:"category";s:54:"Members &raquo; User Group Settings &raquo; Attachment";}i:383;a:5:{s:9:"module_id";s:10:"attachment";s:5:"title";s:106:"Max file size for items upload in kilobytes (kb).
